text: Hi <@U05Q2R4ESCA>! we started getting this error when hitting a *`crm/v3/lists/search`* endpoint. I'm not sure what happened and why would we suddenly loose access to this endpoint (couldn't find any explanation in the HubSpot API docs or anywhere on the internet ) :thinkonk: Ah, the funny thing is that we're still able to fetch the list memberships with the V3 api :slightly_smiling_face: Any help would be appreciated!
Hey Maxim - sorry about this. This is happening due to an issue as we look to try and release the next set of endpoints. Should be fixed in a few minutes :slightly_smiling_face:
Hey <@U066P17RENM> - this should be fixed now, sorry about the inconvenience!
thanks for a quick fix, Justin! I can confirm that this is working fine now :+1:
